title: Humpty Dumpty sat on a wall.
description: The evening started out innocuously enough; few could have predicted the ensuing tragedy.

title: Humpty Dumpty had a great fall.
description: Witnesses say the fall was shocking and produced a sound like an egg cracking.

title: All the king's horses and all the king's men
description: It has yet to be explained why the king's horses were assigned to a task which required such fine motor skills.

title: Couldn't put Humpty together again.
description: The funeral is set for this weekend.
